original_text: And the hand of the Lord was on Elijah, and he gathered up his garment and ran before Ahab to the entrance of Jezreel.
korean_text: 여호와의 능력이 엘리야에게 임하매 그가 허리를 동이고 이스르엘로 들어가는 곳까지 아합 앞에서 달려갔더라

sentences.original_text: And the hand of the Lord was on Elijah
and he gathered up his garment
and ran before Ahab to the entrance of Jezreel
